body:
As minecraft gets more downloads everyday,, Names will be much more common. Back in 2010, There were so much names available you didn't need to add a Xx or _ to ur name,( ex:HarryPotter and _HarryP0tter). Now days people make their name really long. The shorter the name, the better. Unless its og of course XD. Now people have been asking how to get a 3 letter name, as now days, even 4 letter names are uncommon, So..
How do you get a 3 letter name?

Well, for starters, you can use a 3 letter name generator.
I would recommend http://www.dave-reed.com/Nifty/randSeq.html.

Or you could use one specifically for Minecraft. 
Like this one https://github.com/C4K3/minecraft-3-character-names

In which it it checks the Mojang API for all possible 3 letter names, They do work I guess. 

anyways, this is a short post Lol

clickn out


~Clickn

replies.body: If you check upcoming available names, 3 letter names are actually fairly common. The thing is, most of them are pointless such as X6D, 2BB, Y96, 3J1, 06p, etc. Good 3 letter names rarely become available, and even if they do they will most likely get sniped and sold to people who spend too much money on Minecraft names.
